memory: Nee last celebrated bday mowa DLF lo, lat time koda manam kalavale ga, anduke chinna memory laga pettam... Happy irthday mowa... 🎂🎉

Khazaguda hills mowa... edo sahasam cheseddam ani vellipoyi anna ikkada peddaga telisina vallu kanabadatle nv vastava ani phn chesaru, pooji ledu kada ani shijju and chimpu asalu pakka nootana vadhuvu varudu laga kurchunnaru ayya choodalekapoyam nenu sana asalu 🐒
Thanksuu frends, aa roju aithe surprise ee dress techi isthe marchukoni vachi marii photos digam, chimpu choco chesina gola mamuluga ledu aaroju matram🤣
Manam andaram kalisina last day mowa... nee gandharva swaram tho appudu konni songs paadav gurthundi ga, andulo high-light malli demand chestunnam 'who are you' song, paadu gajala paadu

Nee placement day mowa... veligipoyaru appudu asalu, appatidaka rojuu nidralekunda tensions anni poyi chakkaga enjoy chesam chala rojula tarwata, naku aithe nenu place ainappatikanna happy ga anipichindi mowa... asalu car lo entha chakkaga padukunnaro iddaru kalisi shijju emo levandra ani cheppadaniki koda feel avtundi..., anyway happy birthday mowa 🎂🎉
